DOC.brief_summary: a clinical study of Ginseng its potential affect on diabetes
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial of Ginseng in Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Comparing three groups (those with & without normal blood sugar levels) to see if there is any clinically significant change in blood sugar levels in relationship to those taking: 1. ginseng 2. ginsenoside RE (a type of metabolized ginseng) 3. placebo
DOC.criteria: ages 1865 healthy, nondiabetic healthy, impaired glucose tolerance/mild diabetes (no medications required) impaired glucose tolerance (borderline diabetes that requires medications) diabetes (requiring medications) caffeine sensitivity known cardiac, peripheral vascular diseases arrhythmias (irregular heart rhythms)
